msg: Patched some JavaDoc comments so that the generated tag documentation looks neater

msg: fixed cocoon typeo - Jelly is a possible Generator, not really a Transformer

author: jstrachan

author: jstrachan
msg: Fixed the tag doclet so that the build can now generate reasonable documentation for all the current tag libraries as part of the maven build.

Some javadoc tags like

and don't quite get converted to XML unfortunately but its getting close.
Also the documentation doesn't handle derivation or importing of tags into other taglibs yet.

author: jstrachan
msg: Provided factory methods for XMLOutput which does not escape XML output.
This is useful for using XMLOutput in cases when the output is textual rather than XML
such as when using Jelly inside Maven or Ant, where there is no need to escape '<' or '>' in output logs.
